medium: Watercolor and graphite on thin white wove paper
title: Young Girl with Red and Black Hat
marks: Signature, Mark [Marie Laurencin] in graphite at lower right corne
description: Portrait of a blue-eyed woman seen from the shoulders up, she is wearing a black hat with red ribbon and a black scarf.
